articles.title: Power demand to fuel Indian Energy Exchange's growth: 4 reasons it is this week's stock pick - Economic Times
articles.description: Indian Energy Exchange (IEX) holds around 95% market share of electricity contracts in India’s energy exchange market. Debt-free balance sheet and strong return ratios are the other factors that have made the company a favourite of analysts.

articles.author: Kshitij Anand
articles.title: Stock Radar: Up 50% so far in 2022! This hotel stock is in a strong uptrend; time to buy? - Economic Times
articles.description: The hotel stock has been moving in a higher high and higher low formation in 2022, which pushed it to a fresh 52-week high of Rs 345 on 5 July 2022. Traders can look to buy the stock now or on dips for a potential target of Rs 370 in the next 4-6 weeks, sugge…
